entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor ValidationMessage does not respect the display annotation #48354
  • Adding compression directives to a csproj breaks a Linux build with DN8P4 #48353
  • Linked files in wwwroot results in "More than one compatible asset found for" error. #48349

Closed

  • Revisiting Blazor Multi-threading #48345

PullRequests

Created

  • Issue #45096 Toru_Watanbe #48352
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Use `Type.IsByRefLike`. #48351
    community-contribution, needs-area-label

Updated

  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • explicitly identifying button type in QuickGrid columnbase #48277
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [blazor] Read appsettings loaded by the runtime into the VFS #48326
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview5
  • Add some notes on testing trimming #48333
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching
  • Enable Blazor Server and WebAssembly components to run in the same document #48294
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Add new Blazor Web Template #48285
    area-mvc
